snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [076] Supreme Warrior
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By:- /Y\ad/Y\atty

Once again some smartass developer  thaught it would be a good idea to limit the ending movie to those that can complete the game on Expert(Supreme) difficulty.  Sorry for looking n00bish playing the game I did the best I could.  Blocking is easy as you always see that coming but timing the other hits is insainly precise.

Another issue with the game is the odd option of the B+C buttons switching the language track in the game anytime durring play.  So if you hear Cantanese, its due to me button mashing and not realising.

I cant say I like this game. The fights were far to long and no onscreen help at all in this difficulty.  I couldn't seem to use the Special abilities I picked up for use on Fang Tu.  The Manual says Down + X or Y or Z (for the respective powers) but it wasn't happening.

06:08 Fire Guards and Warlord
18:36 Earth Guards and Warlord
33:16 Wind Guards and Warlord
47:25 Fang Tu Guards and Warlord
61:40 Ending -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
